random kuwana ndangariro: Volatile memory uko kunomhanya zvirongwa uye data zvakachengetwa
hard disk drive: Yakakura-inogoneka isiri-inotenderera yekuchengetedza mudziyo uchishandisa magineti ndiro
solid state drive: Kuchengetera kusingaite uchishandisa flash memory, nekukurumidza kupfuura HDDs
bhazi: Nzira yekuti data ifambe pakati pezvikamu
mudziyo wekuisa: Inobvumira data kupinda mukombuta (se keyboard, mbeva)
motherboard: The main circuit board inobatanidza zvikamu zvose zvekombiyuta
komputa network: Muunganidzwa wemidziyo yakabatana inogona kugovera zviwanikwa
ip kero: Iyo yakasarudzika nhamba identifier inopihwa kune yega yega mudziyo pane network
bandwidth: Iyo yakanyanya mwero wekufambiswa kwedata munzira yetiweki
latency: Kunonoka kwenguva yekuti data ifambe kubva kwairi kuenda kwainoenda
